__e: Everything was delightful and well worth the wait.
But then he brings you something unbelievably delicious and you realise he knows better than you could ever know, and you never want to go to any other restaurant ever again.
A delicious man and all man from the top of his head... To the tip of his toes.
This is just too delicious, I can't stand it.
Can't you see how delicious it would be, and how just?
And, how sweet it is to succeed in this, how delicious it is to be a whore to everyone who would have to do with you!
- It tastes delicious, but I know what you can do.
It was very nice, but I have a family and you have a husband.
- It looks delicious, but we really must--
